stimulusHtml: Which of the following code segments will produce the same output as the given code segment?

features.html:
In the following code segment,  arr  is a one-dimensional array of integers.

 

int sum = 0; 
for (int n : arr) 
{ 
   sum = sum + 2 * n; 
} 
System.out.print(sum);

choicesHtml:
int sum = 0; 
for (int k = 0; k < arr.length; k++) 
{ 
   sum = sum + 2 * k; 
} 
System.out.print(sum);

int sum = 0; 
for (int k = 0; k <= arr.length; k++) 
{ 
   sum = sum + 2 * k; 
} 
System.out.print(sum);

int sum = 0; 
for (int k = 0; k < arr.length; k++) 
{ 
   sum = sum + 2 * arr[k]; 
} 
System.out.print(sum);

int sum = arr[0]; 
for (int k = 1; k <= arr.length; k++) 
{ 
   sum = sum + 2 * arr[k]; 
} 
System.out.print(sum);
